summary: WITH ONLY 8200 MILES AND 5 MONTHS ON THE ROAD, ORIGINAL BATTERY STARTED TO LEAK AND TWICE EXPERIENCED A TIME WHEN PUSH BUTTON START WOULD NOT START THE ENGINE.  STRANDED.  ONCE THE PROBLEM RESOLVED ITSELF F AFTER 20 MINUTES.  THE SECOND TIME REQUIRED A JUMP START TO GET THE ENGINE GOING.  NO PROBLEMS ONCE THE ENGINE GOT STARTED.  REPLACED LEAKING BATTERY AND PROBLEM HAS NOT RETURNED.
